main_text:
Philosophy of Mathematics || New Foundations of Mathematics
11.3 New Foundations of Mathematics

All these interesting achievements of Bolzano regarding details
nonetheless seem insignificant in view of his epochal attempt, which
he unfortunately could not complete, to put all of mathematics on new
foundations. The fact alone that Bolzano sensed the necessity of such
a new grounding of mathematics shows his mathematical instinct,
although this program could only much later be realized.
